record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON CALENDAR--S. 2247
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON CALENDAR--S. 2247 -- (Senate - October 29, 2007)

[Page: S13497]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I understand that S. 2247 is at the desk and is due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2247) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the depreciation classification of motorsports entertainment complexes.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to this legislation.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
